title: Projects
description:
A concise overview of selected frontend development projects, showcasing skills and capabilities.

If you want to check my actual frontend skills, let's get a call

projects.title: Airlogix.io
projects.description: Multi-page website for Ukrainian drone manufacturer - Airlogix. Techs: Next.js, next-intl, Typescript, styled-components, Sendgrid API, Vercel

projects.title: Tasks Manager
projects.description: React.js • Redux • Typescript • shadcn/ui • Tailwind • Vite

projects.title: Expense Tracker
projects.description: Track your incomes/expenses from any device using this React/Firebase expense tracker! Featuring Typescript, MUI and Parcel

projects.title: ReactGPT
projects.description: I built my own ChatGPT with React/Typescript, featuring slick design (thanks to the shadcn/ui library), light/dark theme and ability to chose GPT version (3.5 or 4). Bundled with Vite

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Vladyslav's portfolio website designed by himself and developed using Next.js, Typescript and Framer Motion. Featuring a brand new Notion API-driven blog and contact form that handles requests with Sendgrid API

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: A weather application developed using React, Redux, Material UI, Typescript and ChartJS, featuring a Microsoft-inspired interface.

projects.title: Todo App
projects.description: Todo List app built with ReactJS. Features: easy-to-use interface, fast and responsive, sleek UI, saved in localStorage.

projects.title: 2048 Game
projects.description: A popular 2048 game built using React.js, featuring smooth animations, touch/swipe/keyboard controls and elegant dark theme you never saw before

projects.title: Snake Game
projects.description: A classic Snake Game clone, built using pure (Vanilla) JavaScript, with a nostalgic and classic gameplay experience.

projects.title: Password Generator
projects.description: A fast and secure Password Generator built using Preact and Web Crypto API for strong random password generation.

projects.title: Alarms & Clock Clone
projects.description: Windows 10 "Alarms & Clock" app clone created with ReactJS, Framer Motion, and FluentUI library

projects.title: Ocular
projects.description: Delivered front-end for "Ocular" medical center website, providing a seamless user experience for ophthalmology patients.

projects.title: His.ua
projects.description: Developed front-end for "His," a Ukrainian brand for exclusive furniture.

projects.title: Tenzies Game
projects.description: A simple tenzies game built using React
